Description: The results of the Welsh Housing Conditions Survey 2017 - 2018
Name: Welsh Housing Conditions Survey
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified under heading Reports labelled as Results Viewer in both XLS and ODS formats.
Sizing Notes: Large(ish) table but with simple structure, though there are subdimensions present. Binary/ODS format should enable straightforward transformation to tidy data. Up-front work required to establish best source of data.
